name: Evilplumbing
body:
# Evil.Plumbing
A landing page for a conference talks, or an excuse to buy a cool domain.

### Media
The presentation deck will be available for download here, after it has been presented at [AtlSecCon](http://atlseccon.com).

### Schedule
* AtlSecCon - Halifax - April 7 at 2:00pm
* Thotcon - Chicago - May 5 or 6
* Northsec - Montreal - May 19 or 20

### Resources and Links
[New feature in Office 2016 can block macros and help prevent infection](https://blogs.technet.microsoft.com/mmpc/2016/03/22/new-feature-in-office-2016-can-block-macros-and-help-prevent-infection/)
[Microsoft Security Compliance Manager (SCM)](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-ca/solutionaccelerators/cc835245.aspx)
[Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) 5.5](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=50766)
[Mimikatz](https://github.com/gentilkiwi/mimikatz)
[Securing Critical and Service Accounts](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc875826.aspx)
[Privileged Access Workstations](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt634654.aspx)
[Windows Device Guard Overview](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn986865(v=vs.85).aspx)
[Blocking Remote Use of Local Accounts](http://blogs.technet.com/b/secguide/archive/2014/09/02/blocking-remote-use-of-local-accounts.aspx)


### Authors and Contributors
Guillaume Ross - [@gepeto42](https://twitter.com/gepeto42)

Jordan Rogers - [@joeynoname](https://twitter.com/joeynoname)
